name: Lyon Advertising
tagline: To have fun building extraordinary brands.
description:
Lyon Advertising is a consumer branding company specializing in creating brands from the ground up, as well as working with existing brands that need help driving sales and connecting with consumers. We enjoy meeting new people who are looking to grow their brand and their bottom line.We have had great success with the companies we work with, including the creation of the original branding and packaging for Sweet Leaf Tea.
This helped them become one of the nation’s fastest growing beverages, and to be acquired by Nestle in 2011. We also worked with Freebirds World Burrito, helping them to grow from four stores to 20 and to be acquired in 2008. We have created award-winning mobile applications, television commercials and experiential concepts. We seek out the best solutions for every client, and work tirelessly to ensure success. If you want to have fun building an extraordinary brand, let’s chat.
